Docs.param: The unique identifier of the device. This case-sensitive string can be up to 128 characters long, and supports ASCII 7-bit alphanumeric characters plus the following special characters: - : . + % _ # * ? ! ( ) , = @ ; $ '.
Name of the IoT Hub where the device was created or deleted.
The event type specified for this operation by the IoT Hub.
The ISO8601 timestamp of the operation.
Information about the device twin, which is the cloud represenation of application device metadata.
